short_summary: Smart Building Program - Regional Standing Offer, Atlantic Region
full_summary:
## Request for Proposal: Smart Building Program
[Applies to Defence Construction Canada: MP 2016-79157]

Defence Construction Canada is seeking proposals from firms interested in establishing a Regional Standing Offer (SO) to provide specific work on an "as and when required" basis to support Department of National Defence (DND) requirements in the Atlantic Region.

**Project Background:**
The project aims to select one (1) contractor to sign a Regional Standing Offer (SO) with DCC to provide services on an "as and when required" basis, with a maximum estimated value of $3,110,000 over a two (2)-year period. Call-ups under the SO are expected to be valued between $100,000 and $500,000.

**Key Highlights:**

* Firm(s) to provide services for a maximum of two (2) years.
* Services will be provided on an "as and when required" basis.
* Estimated total value of up to $3,110,000.
* Opportunities for extensions up to three (3) additional one (1) year periods, with a possible increase in value of up to $445,000 per year.

**Contract Specifications:**
Firms interested in participating must have expertise in the following areas:

* Project Management
* Subject Matter Expert
* Analyst
* Integration Specialist
* Total Classification Rate

**Services to be Provided:**

* Installation Services (stand-alone system and centralized system)
* Deployment Services (stand-alone system and centralized system)
* Reporting Services (Tier 1- Tier 3)
* End of Term Services (fixed fee)
* Decommissioning Services

**Submission Requirements:**
Firms interested in submitting a proposal must register on the MERX electronic bidding system and submit their proposal electronically through the system. The closing date for submissions is May 4, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time).

**Contact Information:**
For further information on the project, please contact Amanda Eid at amanda.eid@dcc-cdc.gc.ca or 343-540-6713.

**Attachments:**
All documents and forms required for the proposal submission can be downloaded from the MERX website. Please note that fees may apply for accessing these documents.

No bid had been finalized at this time, with a tender closing date of May 4, 2023.
